Package crazyballrun.game.level

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Goal
    The Goal-class represents one state of the Statistics-instance of a level.
    Level
    The Level class contains all necessary information for playing on a map.
    LevelDescription
    The LevelDescription class used for the level description shown in the GUI (pre-information of the level, like author, level name, textual and visual level description, ...).
    LevelDescriptionParser
    The LevelDescriptionParser is a "pre-parser" for the LevelParser.
    LevelEngine
    The LevelEngine undertakes the task to pre-load all available level-descriptions when the game starts.
    LevelParser
    The LevelParser parses an XML-file which specifies level-specific data (map texturing, objects on the map, player positions, goals, etc.).
    Statistics
    The Statistics class contains (player specific) data of the current level which may be used to check "player reached goal?"
    Tile
    The Tile describes a texture visually and also physically (for collision detection and ground properties).
    TransitionParser
    The TransitionParser read an xml-file specifying transitions between level- layers.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Statistics.ValueType
    Defines statistical attributes observed by the game for the final statistic shown after finishing a level.
